thread.title: Gold Coast man flush with rage as bag of poo sparks violent home invasion |
thread.title_full: Gold Coast man flush with rage as bag of poo sparks violent home invasion | The Courier-Mail

author: couriermail.com.au
title: Gold Coast man flush with rage as bag of poo sparks violent home invasion |
text:
Douglas Urwin, 26, and his Robina housemate had a dispute over a house “cleaning issue” in December 2013 before his housemate left a bag of faeces in his cupboard.
Urwin moved out but returned the next night with Dylan Tetonga, his uncle and another man and broke in.
In the Southport District Court yesterday Urwin and Tetonga pleaded guilty to two counts of assault occasioning bodily harm, one count each of enter dwelling with intent and wilful damage. Judge Brian Devereaux sentenced them to two years imprisonment to be wholly suspended and two years of probation.
Originally published as Bag of poo sparks violent attack
